name: Calapi
body:
# calapi

## endpoint
http://kinenbiapi.herokuapp.com

## method
POST

## parameter

### by date

<dl>
  <dt>month</dt>
  <dd>1 - 12</dd>
  <dt>day</dt>
  <dd>1 - 31</dd>
</dl>

###by freeword
<dl>
  <dt>keyword</dt>
  <dd>text</dd>
  <dt>search_key</dt>
  <dd> 0 ( or ) / 1 ( and )</dd>
</dl>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
